title: Project-Based Learning for Fostering Social Entrepreneurship in Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of social organization operations and job experience
context.additional_context: Team-based social problem-solving projects conducted in a smartphone-centric limited technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can propose ≥3 creative solutions to identify real community problems
Through team projects, learners achieve ≥80% proficiency in the 5 core competencies of social entrepreneurship (opportunity recognition, planning, leadership, etc.)
Learners use smartphone-based collaboration tools to prepare project reports and incorporate peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
